gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.calc

Class Deaggregation

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.earthquake.nshmp.calc.Deaggregation

  • public final class Deaggregation
extends Object
    Hazard deaggregation. Given a Hazard result, this class will deaggregate the results at all spectral periods supplied in the result at an intensity measure level or return period of interest.
    Author:
    Peter Powers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Deaggregation atIml(Hazard hazard, double iml, Optional<Imt> deaggImt)
      Deaggregate hazard at the supplied intensity measure level.
      static Deaggregation atReturnPeriod(Hazard hazard, double returnPeriod, Optional<Imt> deaggImt)
      Deaggregate hazard at the intensity measure level corresponding to the supplied returnPeriod.
      Object toJson(Imt imt)
      Returns an object constining deaggregation results that is suitable for JSON serialization.
      String toString() 
      Object ÎµBins()
      Returns an object containing epsilon bin data suitable for JSON serialization.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • atReturnPeriod

        public static Deaggregation atReturnPeriod(Hazard hazard,
                                           double returnPeriod,
                                           Optional<Imt> deaggImt)
        Deaggregate hazard at the intensity measure level corresponding to the supplied returnPeriod. Only a single Imt will be processed if supplied.
        Parameters:
        hazard - to deaggregate.
        returnPeriod - at which to deaggregate hazard
        deaggImt - to deaggregate; deaggregate all if empty()

      • atIml

        public static Deaggregation atIml(Hazard hazard,
                                  double iml,
                                  Optional<Imt> deaggImt)
        Deaggregate hazard at the supplied intensity measure level. Only a single Imt will be processed if supplied.
        Parameters:
        hazard - to deaggregate.
        iml - intensity measure level at which to deaggregate hazard
        deaggImt - to deaggregate; deaggregate all if empty()

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • toJson

        public Object toJson(Imt imt)
        Returns an object constining deaggregation results that is suitable for JSON serialization.
        Parameters:
        imt - of the deaggregation to retrieve.

      • ÎµBins

        public Object ÎµBins()
        Returns an object containing epsilon bin data suitable for JSON serialization. This is exposed independent of JSON serialization of as web services may need this metadata independent of deaggregation results.
